Uses of Interface
org.springframework.aop.framework.MethodPointcut

Packages that use MethodPointcut
org.springframework.aop.framework Package containing Spring's basic AOP infrastructure, compliant with the AOP Alliance interfaces. 
org.springframework.transaction.interceptor AOP-based solution for declarative transaction demarcation.  
 

Uses of MethodPointcut in org.springframework.aop.framework
 

Subinterfaces of MethodPointcut in org.springframework.aop.framework
 interface DynamicMethodPointcut
          Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, arguments and attributes passed.
 interface StaticMethodPointcut
          Interface to be implemented by objects that can cause conditional invocation of an Interceptor depending on the method, and attributes passed.
 

Classes in org.springframework.aop.framework that implement MethodPointcut
 class AbstractMethodPointcut
          Abstract convenience superclass for implementations of DynamicMethodPointcut or StaticMethodPointcut.
 class AlwaysInvoked
          MethodPointcut implementation wrapping an Interceptor that should always run.
 class RegexpMethodPointcut
          Perl5 regular expression pointcut bean.

Methods in org.springframework.transaction.interceptor with parameters of type MethodPointcut
 void TransactionProxyFactoryBean.setMethodPointcut(MethodPointcut pointcut)
          Set MethodPointcut, i.e the bean that can cause conditional invocation of this TransactionInterceptor depending on the method, and attributes passed.
